firstNightReminder: The astrophysicist chooses a character. Show a finger symbol equal to the distance the chosen character's player is away from the "sun"
otherNightReminder: The astrophysicist chooses a character. Show a finger symbol equal to the distance the chosen character's player is away from the "sun"
name: Astrophysicist
ability: A random player is the "sun". Each night, choose a character (not astrophysicist), you learn the closest distance they are from the "sun". If the character is not in play, the distance is arbitrary
flavor: Look up, you'll only see this comet once in your lifetime, make a wish!

firstNightReminder: Wake up the environmentalist to tell them the amount of alive townsfolk pairs
otherNightReminder: Wake up the environmentalist to tell them the amount of alive townsfolk pairs
name: Environmentalist
ability: Each night, learn the number of alive good townsfolk pairs. You may register as evil to yourself.
flavor: And this is why we should not introduce the goose to the waterloo ecosystem

firstNightReminder: Wake up the Musician and tell them to select 3 alive players. Then show them thumbs up or thumbs down
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Musician and tell them to select 3 alive players. Then show them thumbs up or thumbs down
name: Musician
ability: Each night, choose 3 players you believe to be alive (not you): learn if there are exactly 2 distinct character types (TF, O, M, D) between them.
flavor: Concert tonight! Free food and drinks, don't miss out!

firstNightReminder: Wake up the Eavesdropper and ask them to choose 3 alive players, then give them the most common alignment
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Eavesdropper and ask them to choose 3 alive players, then give them the most common alignment
name: Eavesdropper
ability: Each night, choose 3 players you believe to be alive (not you): learn the most common alignment between them.
flavor: I heard they were gossiping about you, they were calling you a liar! How could they?

firstNightReminder: Wake up the proctor to have them choose 2 players
otherNightReminder: Wake up the proctor to have them choose 2 players
name: Proctor
ability: Each night, pick two players, you learn which player is a better kill for your team.
flavor: I can smell the cheating from all the way down here

firstNightReminder: The hacker points to a player.
otherNightReminder: The hacker points to a player.
name: Hacker
ability: Each night, choose a player you haven’t chosen before. Tomorrow, you may consult the ST to learn a piece of information important to them.
flavor: You messed with the wrong people

otherNightReminder: If there are more or equal alive evil players to alive good players OR they were killed tonight, wake up campus security and show them an evil character
name: Campus Security
ability: Each night*, if the number of alive evil players is greater than or equal to the number of alive good players OR you were killed tonight, you wake up to learn an evil character in play.
flavor: When the campus most needed help, we arrived

otherNightReminder: Wake up the therapist for them to choose two players.
name: Therapist
ability: Each night*, choose two players (not yourself); they are safe tonight but any previously successfully protected players may die anytime after you die
flavor: I'll listen to whatever you have to say, to whatever is on your mind. University can get tough

otherNightReminder: The Exchange Student wakes up and picks a player. Potentially show the exchange student their new role, and wake the chosen player to show them their new role or information
name: Exch. Student
ability: Each night*, choose an alive player: If they are the same alignment, you swap characters with them. Otherwise, they choose a good character (not narcissist) for you to transform into.
flavor: Hello everyone, nice to meet you!

otherNightReminder: The Advisor wakes up and points to a player. If the target was an outsider, wake that player and show them their new role if it has changed from what they were previously shown
name: Advisor
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they are an outsider, they transform into a not in play townsfolk and you become drunk permanently. [+1 outsider]
flavor: May the applications be ever in your favor (what advisor would say that?)

name: Theorycrafter
ability: Each day, privately ask the ST a question. You learn how important answering that question would be for your team at the current moment.
flavor: So in this game state, it has to be an alchemist-marionette-lunatic who saw they were snake charmed?

otherNightReminder: Kill the chosen character
name: Psychologist
ability: Each day, you may consult the ST to pick a townsfolk, outsider, minion and demon you have not chosen before; you learn how many are in play. One of those players may die before dawn.
flavor: Come in and join my research study! (no safety guarantees)

name: Gamer
ability: Once per game, you may publicly reveal yourself as the gamer and name a player/character pair. If you are correct, they die and you may repeat this ability again (up to 2 times)
flavor: It all builds up to this gamer moment

otherNightReminder: If the prodigy has died, wake the prodigy to alert them that they are the prodigy. If the prodigy transforms, wake them and alert them of their new role
name: Prodigy
ability: You think you are and have the ability of a townsfolk; when you die, you learn that you are the prodigy. On any night, you might transform permanently into a different townsfolk.
flavor: I have 3 majors in math, computer science and biochemistry. Oh I also entered into university when I was 14.

name: Drunk
ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a not in play Townsfolk character, but you are not.
flavor: "I’m only a *hic* social drinker, my dear. Admittedly, I am a heavy *burp* socializer."

name: Intern
ability: You do not know you are the Intern. You think you are an in play townsfolk character but you are not
flavor: I know this is the 10th time today... but... How do you do this?

name: Coward
ability: When both of your neighbors are dead, you swap alignments (does NOT count if you turn into coward with both neighbors dead)
flavor: You're LYING, ALL OF YOU ARE LYING

otherNightReminder: If the demon died yesterday with 5 or more players remaining, show swapped characters to each player and swapped alignments if necessary
name: Narcissist
ability: If the demon dies during the day (ending the game) while 5 or more players are alive, swap characters and alignments with them.
flavor: This game WILL be centered around ME, because I'm the best, obviously

firstNightReminder: The distraction points to up to 3 players. If their alignment changed from good -> evil, wake those 3 players and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign. Then wake up the distraction to tell them who were shown their alignment was evil
otherNightReminder: If a distracted player dies, and their alignment was previously shown as evil, wake that player and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs up good sign.
name: Distraction
ability: On the first night, choose up to 3 players. They may be shown their alignment is evil (you learn who is evil) but retain their original alignment. When those players die, they are shown they are good (even when you are dead)
flavor: I'm sorry, my exam is in 2 days, I have to st-- Did someone say text clocktower?

firstNightReminder: Wake up the Peer Pressurer and point to all outsider players
otherNightReminder: The peer pressurer points to a player, they are shown that player's character. Wake that player and show them their new role if it has changed from what they were previously shown.
name: Peer Pressurer
ability: You start knowing all outsider players. Once per game, at night*, you may choose an outsider's neighbor to permanently transform into an outsider (can be in play) [+1 outsider]
flavor: I'm playing, they're playing, everyone's playing! What do you mean you're not playing?

otherNightReminder: The Plagiarizer points to a player and kills them, then learns their new role
name: Plagiarizer
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose to kill a player and transform into their character.
flavor: Policy 71.

firstNightReminder: Wake up the Gaslighter and show them the grimoire. Then have them choose if they want to die.
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Gaslighter and show them the grimoire. Then have them choose if they want to die.
name: Gaslighter
ability: Each night, you see the grimoire, you may then choose to die. When you die, your nearest living townsfolk neighbor is poisoned permanently.
flavor: No, you said that this was your favorite. How could you forget?

otherNightReminder: Mr. Goose wake up and points to a player who is marked "Dead". If all minions are dead, Mr. Goose may additionally point to one more player.
name: Mr. Goose
ability: Each night*, choose a player, they die. If all your minions are dead, you may choose two players instead.
flavor: You do NOT want to see him angry

firstNightReminder: Wake each townsfolk/outsider who is evil individually and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign.
otherNightReminder: The final exam learns a player who is evil, then either picks a player or may point to every other player and pick a character for each one, all correct are marked as "Dead".
name: Final Exam
ability: Each night*, learn an evil player, then choose a player; they die. Once per game, at night*, you may instead guess a character for each player, each player you guess correctly dies. [-minions]
flavor: I should have studied harder for this...

firstNightReminder: Wake the townsfolk/outsider who is evil and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign. Wake up the council to show them their evil team
otherNightReminder: The council points to a player, they are marked as "Dead".
name: The Council
ability: Each night*, choose a player, they die. One townsfolk/outsider is evil, you know who they are. If there are 3 or more players alive during the day, and none are good, good wins.
flavor: What decisions should we make this year? This, that, nah, just keep it the same

firstNightReminder: Wake each waterloo warrior up and show them the role they think they are
otherNightReminder: Wake up the minions and have them pick a target to kill
name: Waterloo Warrior
ability: You think you are a good character, but you are not. The 1st Waterloo Warrior to die, becomes good. Each night*, Minions choose a player: they die. [+1 Waterloo Warrior]
flavor: The evil is in all of us, it could be any of us

name: Shared Info
ability: ALL sober astrophysicists (or prodigies with the ability) share the same targets (sun)

name: Narcissism
ability: There can only be one narcissist in play, if one attempts to create another while one is in play, it silently fails

name: Final Exam Rules
ability: All minions are replaced with evil townsfolk/outsiders
